name: Apple Pie Maker
description:
In the heat of the summer afternoon, there's nothing more refreshing than a piping to apple pie. It makes the whole house smell great and makes your mouth water with anticipation. Prepare this fantastic summer treat quickly for a high rating and score.

I love the smell of apple pie, but it just takes so many apples to bake! And it's always a surprising amount of butter! But I guess that's what makes it so savory and delicious! Complete this game, and then try out the easy baking recipe for yourself!

Game Features:
Apple Pie
Apple Pie Maker
Apple Pie Cooking Games
American Cooking Games
Cook American Apple Pie
American Apple Pie Maker
